subject: Hockey, Ice
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Penguins captain Sidney Crosby won his second Hart Trophy as the N.H.L.’s most valuable player at the league’s postseason awards ceremony Tuesday in Las Vegas.
snippet: Pittsburgh Penguins captain Sidney Crosby won his second Hart Trophy as the N.H.L.’s most valuable player at the league’s postseason awards ceremony Tuesday in Las Vegas.
